articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: BRICS Summit 2023 LIVE: Indians in South Africa prepare 'Rakhi' thali for PM Modi | Mint - Mint
articles.description: BRICS Summit 2023 today LIVE: BRICS Summit 2023 will begin on Tuesday. It is the first in-person summit after three consecutive years of virtual meetings owing to the Covid-19 pandemic.
articles.content: BRICS Summit 2023 Today: The heads of India, China, and Brazil plus Russia's top diplomat will gather from Tuesday to Thursday this week in Johannesburg for the 15th BRICS Summit. Prime Minister Nare… [+10303 chars]
